description.@en: Look—I know what’s best for us. I’ve taken us to the limit and know where my pain threshold starts and stops. If you don’t come along with me, you’ll have hell to pay!

data.notes: Grievous Injuries must undergo a successful Perform Surgery within twenty-four hours of suffering it, or else a character gains its related Permanent Injury.

effect.@en: Whenever you deal Damage and don’t inflict an Injury upon your foe, you gain 1 Conflict.
